trans-unit.source: Represents the Behavior objects that are managed by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerar problemet objekt som hanteras av en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class can be extended to develop any type of user interface behavior, including selection, drag, and resize behaviors.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen kan utökas för att utveckla någon typ av användarbeteende för gränssnittet, inklusive val av dra, och ändra storlek på beteenden.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [översikt över beteendet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Your Behavior type must be associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> type.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Din beteendetypen måste associeras med en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>typ.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: Glyph-independent behaviors are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Oberoende av glyf beteenden stöds inte.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> class with the given <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> klassen med den angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The parent behavior is the next behavior on the behavior stack maintained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Beteendet överordnade görs nästa beteende-stacken som underhålls av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: If the `callParentBehavior` parameter is `true`, then the `behaviorService` parameter must not be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Om den `callParentBehavior` parametern är `true`, sedan `behaviorService` parametern får inte vara `null`.

trans-unit.source: `callParentBehavior` indicates whether the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> class should call the parent behavior, and then allow the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> select the correct parent behavior.
trans-unit.target: `callParentBehavior`Anger om grundläggande <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>klass ska anropa överordnade beteende, och låt den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>väljer rätt överordnade beteende.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parent behavior should be called if it exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om beteendet överordnade ska anropas om det finns något. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to use.

trans-unit.source: callParentBehavior is , and behaviorService is .
trans-unit.target: callParentBehavioris , and behaviorService is .

trans-unit.source: Gets the cursor that should be displayed for this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar markören som ska visas för det här problemet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref> that represents the cursor that should be displayed for this behavior.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"> </xref> som representerar markören som ska visas för det här problemet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> objects should be disabled.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref> objekt ska vara inaktiverat.

trans-unit.source: A `true` value for the DisableAllCommands property indicates to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> that all <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> objects the designer receives should have their state disabled when this behavior is active.
trans-unit.target: En `true` värdet för egenskapen DisableAllCommands anger att den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>som alla <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>objekt som tar emot designern ska ha sina tillstånd inaktiveras när det här beteendet är aktiv.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: The DisableAllCommands property works in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A> method so you can customize the interaction between glyphs and behaviors.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DisableAllCommands fungerar tillsammans med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A>metoden så att du kan anpassa interaktionen mellan tecken och beteenden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes the results of a call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A> for a particular <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>.
trans-unit.target: I följande tabell sammanfattas resultatet av ett anrop till <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A>för en viss <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: |||| |-|-|-| ||DisableAllCommands is `true`|DisableAllCommands is `false`| |Hit-tested glyph has an assigned behavior|If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> with the specified `command ID` is found in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>, that <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> is disabled and returned.
trans-unit.target: |||| |-|-|-| || DisableAllCommands är `true`| DisableAllCommands är `false`| | Träffar testas glyf har en tilldelad beteende | Om den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>med det angivna `command ID` finns i den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>, som <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>har inaktiverats och returneras.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, `null` is returned.|<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A> is called on the behavior and, if found, the behavior’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Annars `null` returneras. | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>anropas på problemet och, om finns beteenden <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>returneras.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> with the specified `command ID` is returned.| |Hit-tested glyph has no assigned behavior|The result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> with the specified `command ID` is returned.|The result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> with the specified `command ID` is returned.|
trans-unit.target: I annat fall resultatet av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>med det angivna `command ID` returneras. | | Träffar testas glyf har inga tilldelade beteende | Resultatet av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>med det angivna `command ID` returneras. | Resultatet av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>med det angivna `command ID` returneras. |</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> objects the designer receives should have states set to `Enabled = false` when this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> is active; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om alla <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref> objekt som tar emot designern ska ha tillstånd inställda `Enabled = false` när detta <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> är aktiv, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Intercepts commands.
trans-unit.target: Fångar upp kommandon.

trans-unit.source: The FindCommand method is called from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: FindCommand-metoden anropas från <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: It provides an opportunity for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> to return its own custom <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>, thereby intercepting this message.
trans-unit.target: Det ger en möjlighet för den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>att returnera sin egen anpassad <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>och på så sätt fånga upp det här meddelandet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: By default, FindCommand returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Som standard FindCommand returnerar <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-and-drop behavior.
trans-unit.target: Tillåter dra och släpp-beteende.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> object on which to invoke drag-and-drop behavior.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> objekt som du vill anropa dra och släpp-beteende.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-enter behavior.
trans-unit.target: Tillåter anpassade ange dra-beteende.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> on which to invoke drag-enter behavior.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> som att anropa dra-Ange beteende.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-leave behavior.
trans-unit.target: Tillåter anpassade dra lämna beteende.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> on which to invoke drag-leave behavior.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> som att anropa dra lämna beteende.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-over behavior.
trans-unit.target: Tillåter dra över beteende.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> on which to invoke drag-over behavior.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> som att anropa dra över beteende.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-and-drop feedback behavior.
trans-unit.target: Tillåter anpassade dra och släpp feedback beteende.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> on which to invoke drag-and-drop behavior.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> som att anropa dra och släpp-beteende.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Called by the adorner window when it loses mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Anropas av fönstret dekorationer när det förlorar musinfångningen.

trans-unit.source: A behavior can request mouse capture through the behavior service by pushing itself onto the behavior stack with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushCaptureBehavior%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ett beteende kan begära musinfångningen via tjänsten beteende genom att trycka på sig själv till stacken beteende med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushCaptureBehavior%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushCaptureBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: If it does so, it will be notified through the OnLoseCapture method when capture is lost.
trans-unit.target: Om detta sker meddelas den via metoden OnLoseCapture när avbildningen har gått förlorade.

trans-unit.source: Generally the behavior removes itself from the stack at this time.
trans-unit.target: Vanligtvis beteendet tar bort själva från stacken just nu.

trans-unit.source: Capture is lost when one of the following actions occurs: - Someone else requests capture.
trans-unit.target: Avbilda går förlorad när något av följande inträffar:-någon annan begär avbildning.

trans-unit.source: - Another behavior is pushed.
trans-unit.target: -En annan beteendet är nedtryckt.

trans-unit.source: - This behavior is removed.
trans-unit.target: -Den här funktionen tas bort.

trans-unit.source: In each of these cases, OnLoseCapture will be called on the behavior.
trans-unit.target: I dessa fall anropas OnLoseCapture på beteende.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> on which to invoke drag-and-drop behavior.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> som att anropa dra och släpp-beteende.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som innehåller informationen om händelsen.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when any double-click message enters the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när alla Dubbelklicka på meddelandet anger fönstret dekorationer för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseDoubleClick method is called when any double-click message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: OnMouseDoubleClick-metoden anropas när alla meddelanden som dubbelklicka når den `WndProc` i fönstret dekorationer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: The message is first passed here, to the top-most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Meddelandet först skickades här, till översta <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>i stacken beteende.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> and should not continue to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar `true` från den här metoden innebär det att meddelandet har hanterats av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>och bör inte fortsätta att bearbetas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Härifrån kan skicka meddelandet till lämpligt funktionssätt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref> value indicating which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref> värde som anger vilken knapp har klickats på.

trans-unit.source: The location at which the click occurred.
trans-unit.target: Den plats som då klicka inträffade.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om meddelandet har hanterats; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-down message enters the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när en musknapp-ned meddelandet anger fönstret dekorationer för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-down message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>metoden anropas när en musknapp-ned meddelandet når den `WndProc` i fönstret dekorationer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message is first passed here, to the top-most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Meddelandet först skickades här, till översta <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>i stacken beteende.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> and should not continue to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar `true` från den här metoden innebär det att meddelandet har hanterats av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>och bör inte fortsätta att bearbetas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Härifrån kan skicka meddelandet till lämpligt funktionssätt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref> value indicating which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref> värde som anger vilken knapp har klickats på.

trans-unit.source: The location at which the click occurred.
trans-unit.target: Den plats som då klicka inträffade.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om meddelandet har hanterats; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-enter message enters the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när alla mouse-enter meddelandet anger fönstret dekorationer för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-enter message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>metoden anropas när alla meddelanden som mouse-enter når den `WndProc` i fönstret dekorationer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Härifrån kan skicka meddelandet till lämpligt funktionssätt.

trans-unit.source: When the mouse pointer's location is positively hit-tested with a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> than previous hit tests, this method is called on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: När muspekaren rör plats är positivt träffar-testats med en annan <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>än tidigare träffar tester den här metoden anropas på <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>som är associerade med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om meddelandet har hanterats; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-hover message enters the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när musen hovra meddelanden anger fönstret dekorationer för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-hover message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>metoden anropas när musen hovra meddelanden når den `WndProc` i fönstret dekorationer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message is first passed here, to the top-most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Meddelandet först skickades här, till översta <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>i stacken beteende.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> and should not continue to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar `true` från den här metoden innebär det att meddelandet har hanterats av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>och bör inte fortsätta att bearbetas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Härifrån kan skicka meddelandet till lämpligt funktionssätt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The location at which the hover occurred.
trans-unit.target: Den plats där hovra uppstod.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om meddelandet har hanterats; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-leave message enters the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när alla musen lämnar meddelandet anger fönstret dekorationer för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-leave message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>metoden anropas när ett meddelande med musen lämnar når den `WndProc` i fönstret dekorationer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Härifrån kan skicka meddelandet till lämpligt funktionssätt.

trans-unit.source: When the mouse pointer leaves a positively hit-tested <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>, this method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: När muspekaren lämnar ett positivt träffar testade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>med ett giltigt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>, denna metod anropas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om meddelandet har hanterats; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-move message enters the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när alla musrörelse meddelandet anger fönstret dekorationer för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-move message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>metoden anropas när alla musrörelse meddelanden når den `WndProc` i fönstret dekorationer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message is first passed here, to the top-most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Meddelandet först skickades här, till översta <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>i stacken beteende.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> and should not continue to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar `true` från den här metoden innebär det att meddelandet har hanterats av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>och bör inte fortsätta att bearbetas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Härifrån kan skicka meddelandet till lämpligt funktionssätt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref> value indicating which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref> värde som anger vilken knapp har klickats på.

trans-unit.source: The location at which the move occurred.
trans-unit.target: Den plats där flyttningen uppstod.

trans-unit.target: Anropas när en mus upp meddelandet anger fönstret dekorationer för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-up message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>metoden anropas när en mus upp meddelandet når den `WndProc` i fönstret dekorationer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message is first passed here, to the top-most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Meddelandet först skickades här, till översta <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>i stacken beteende.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> and should not continue to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar `true` från den här metoden innebär det att meddelandet har hanterats av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>och bör inte fortsätta att bearbetas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Härifrån kan skicka meddelandet till lämpligt funktionssätt.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref> värde som anger vilken knapp har klickats på.

trans-unit.source: Sends this drag-and-drop event from the adorner window to the appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> or hit-tested <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Skickar den här dra och släpp-händelsen från fönstret dekorationer till lämplig <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> eller träffar testas <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.
